reviewText: A fun game but you guys should really consider making some of the levels easier or at least lowering the required times for each medal. Nice controls and all though:)

reviewText:
There's no doubt this game is not for the faint-hearted but its value lies in the challenge.

I like the usual lander style game and thought this may be of the same style but was surprised at the ease of the control and the ability for delicate touches which is definately required here. Using a keyboard I was easily able to manipulate the trickier levels.
I've played a few hours at present and although I can't play it for too long - maybe 30 minutes at a time - I keep coming back for more and even though I wouldn't say I am an expert I'm improving my score over time.

The asthetic is very stylish and the color scheme and audio have been well worked out and clearly it's a labor of love with some fine attention to detail throughout. I certainly would recommend the game for those who want a challenge as clearly it isn't a game to play while you pat the dog.

Altogether a finely crafted and well designed game way above the regular indie standard and at a reasonable price tag too.

reviewText: Decent controls and good performance but otherwise the game is pretty lifeless.  Ultimately though I had to stop playing it because of the frustration factor.  Navigating through a complex level once is fine but making me traverse it multiple times with no checkpoints in between is just torture.

reviewText: I couldn't play this for too long due to the difficulty, I barely made it to level 7 (I know I suck) but if you're someone who likes a tough challenge then this is for you. Loved the sound design and music though. I'll pick up a gift copy at Christmas and give it to someone who loves a challenge.\n\nI guess I'll leave this here, cheers Chris,

reviewText: Was digging this game's physics and gameplay and controls but got stuck at around level 5.  Will probably come back to it later but this is just too difficult.  I don't mind a challenge but this is pretty ridiculous.
